content.en: Flash storage optimization: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the performance and efficiency of flash-based storage systems. They have developed algorithms that can optimize buffer replacement, improve wear leveling, enhance page replacement, and manage cache in NAND flash memory. These algorithms aim to reduce I/O costs, improve overall performance, and extend the lifespan of flash memory devices, ultimately enhancing the user experience in consumer electronics.
content.da: Flash-lageroptimering: Forskere har udforsket måder at forbedre ydeevnen og effektiviteten af flash-baserede lagersystemer. De har udviklet algoritmer, der kan optimere bufferudskiftning, forbedre slidudjævning, forbedre sideudskiftning og administrere cache i NAND-flashhukommelse. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at reducere I/O-omkostninger, forbedre den samlede ydeevne og forlænge levetiden for flash-hukommelsesenheder, hvilket i sidste ende forbedrer brugeroplevelsen i forbrugerelektronik.
